item.title: The Manta Ray That Eluded Science For 15 Years
item.description: The newly described Mobula yarae joins a vulnerable group of rays facing threats like bycatch, boat strikes, and habitat loss.

item.title: The Inference Difference: Why Clunky Data Engineering Unhinges AI
item.description: Firms can’t benefit from agentic AI without the inference process being able to draw on fluid, well-governed and permissioned data supply.

item.title: Are AI Agents The Future Of Customer Service?
item.description: Call centers aren’t dead yet, but AI agents are starting to challenge their role in how businesses handle customer support.
